mapper.select: select * from company_tb where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into company_tb (username, password, email, address, detail_address, company_name, company_numb, created_at) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{companyName}, #{companyNumb}, now())
mapper.update: update company_tb set company_name = #{companyName}, company_scale = #{companyScale}, company_field = #{companyField}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, tel = #{tel}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, profile = #{profile} where id = #{id}
